results.content: I am really new to Angular CLI and the course really gave me the opportunity to learn the basic knowledge about it.  The instructor is really well acquainted about the language as well as teaching it so that any programmer with the basic programming knowledge can follow the course without any hurdle.
results.content_html: I am really new to Angular CLI and the course really gave me the opportunity to learn the basic knowledge about it. The instructor is really well acquainted about the language as well as teaching it so that any programmer with the basic programming knowledge can follow the course without any hurdle.

results.content: Overall not bad. Would be nice if a little more time was spent on the application portion making something a little more non-trivial, for example integrating persistence in with the service.
results.content_html: Overall not bad. Would be nice if a little more time was spent on the application portion making something a little more non-trivial, for example integrating persistence in with the service.
